RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT gevloc_flares.gevloc_flares_id,gevloc_flares.time_start,gevloc_flares.xray_class,gevloc_flares.loc FROM gevloc_flares WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: xray_class
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Importance of flare at X-ray wavelengths -- the peak flux measured at Earth in the 0.1 to 0.8 nm range in units of Watts/sq meter. (See the 'X-ray Class' in the HEC glossary for the specification of this field)

FIELD.name: loc
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Derived Position of the flare in heliographic coordinates.
